thongtin: On a fine day, you get good news. The couple had 1 baby and decided to get married. After 1 year together, you suddenly realize that the child is not yours
You and she are prevented by your family from coming together. You are forced to marry someone else. For 6 months of marriage, you could not forget about her and had an affair with her
You two are married, and one day you are walking down the street to find out he is a third sex, he has been hiding from you for so long
What happens to you after marriage? You find out he has been having an affair with your best friend. You're glad there was a reason to break up because you're having an affair too.

One year after dating, they decided to get married. However, on their wedding night, the husband suddenly felt a strong, uncomfortable odor around him. When he kept asking, the bride finally shyly admitted that she had an issue with body odor.

The husband and wife were prevented from being together by their families, and the husband was forced to marry someone else. After 6 months of marriage, the husband realized he still loved his ex-wife and had an affair with her.
On the day of the wedding of the two, the husband met his ex-girlfriend again and developed feelings for her. In the first month of their marriage, the husband secretly contacted his ex-girlfriend.
On the wedding day of the couple, the husband had a traffic accident on the way to pick up his wife, was hospitalized, and the wedding ceremony was postponed.
One month after getting married, the husband hit his wife because she didn't do housework.
One week after getting married, the husband lost his memory, forgot his wife, and asked for a divorce. The husband only remembered his ex-girlfriend.
The wife secretly had an affair with the neighbor because her husband had erectile dysfunction.
After 2 years of marriage, the couple went bankrupt because the husband spent all the money on entertainment and girls.
The couple had a child, and the husband brought his wife home to introduce her to the family, but they were rejected because the family only liked the husband's ex-girlfriend.
After one week of marriage, the wife asked for a divorce upon discovering that her husband had a child with his ex-girlfriend.
At 45 years old, the couple's son will marry the ex-girlfriend of the husband and the three of them will live together under one roof.
At 46 years old, one year after their son married his ex-girlfriend and had a child, the wife discovered that the child was actually her husband's.
At 46 years old, one year after their son married his ex-girlfriend and had a child, the wife discovered that the child was actually her husband's.
The couple got married for a month before they knew they were cousins.
Every day the husband comes home late because he does not want to hear the grumbling words of the lion female.
Married for 1 year, the wife became ugly because her husband used a lot to wear out her beauty.
After receiving his salary, the young man hurriedly stopped by the shop to make a few beers for him, or didn't come home, there was a lioness waiting.
The boy was surprised to learn that the two children he raised for 8 years were not his own.
Married for 10 years, the husband was surprised to learn that he was infertile and had 3 children.
The girl was returned in the night when her husband saw her bare face.
The wife was surprised to learn that her husband's lover was her best friend.
